title: Branch Observation - Loan Officer Borrower Interaction
description: Video recording of in-branch loan officer interaction with walk-in borrower during pre-qualification discussion. Captures actual workflow including dual-entry between paper forms and Encompass, use of rate sheet printouts, and optimistic timeline communication to borrower.
location: Meridian National Bank - Westside Branch, LO Office
consent_reference: Signed video consent form on file; Engagement Letter Section 4.2
pii_notes: Borrower face and voice recorded with consent; no financial documents visible
observations: LO enters data on paper form first, then re-keys into Encompass (dual entry)
Rate sheet is printed from secondary system - not integrated with Encompass pricing
LO quotes '30-35 day close' timeline - actual average is 42-45 days per EV-005
Borrower document checklist handed as photocopy - not generated from Encompass
LO manually calculates DTI on desk calculator before entering into system
finding: PROCESS_INEFFICIENCY - Dual data entry and manual calculations increase error risk and cycle time
